headline: PG&E Corporation (PCG) Awards 54 Scholarships to Students Across Northern and Central California
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is among the 13 Best S&P 500 Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts. On August 14, the company awarded 54 scholarships to students across the PG&E service area. The PG&E Corporation Foundation will sponsor scholarships of $2,500, $5,000, and $10,000 to students pursuing degrees in STEM disciplines. PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) […]
